mapper.select: SELECT DATE_FORMAT(created_at, '%Y-%m') AS `year_month`, COUNT(*) AS count FROM blog_posts WHERE del_flag = '0' GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(created_at, '%Y-%m') ORDER BY DATE_FORMAT(created_at, '%Y-%m') DESC

SELECT blog_id, title, summary, tags, created_at FROM blog_posts WHERE del_flag = '0'
AND created_at >= #{startDate} AND created_at < #{endDate}
select * from blog_posts where del_flag = '0' and blog_id = #{articleId}

SELECT blog_Id, title, CASE WHEN content LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyWord}, '%') THEN SUBSTRING(content, GREATEST(LOCATE(#{keyWord}, content) - 40, 1), 80 + LENGTH(#{keyWord}) ) ELSE summary END AS summary, created_at FROM blog_posts WHERE del_flag = '0' AND MATCH(title, content) AGAINST(#{keyWord} IN BOOLEAN MODE);

SELECT count(*) FROM blog_posts b WHERE b.del_flag = '0'
and b.title like concat('%',#{searchName},'%')
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO blog_posts (title, summary, content, tags, created_at) VALUES (#{title}, #{summary}, #{content}, #{tags}, NOW())
mapper.update: UPDATE blog_posts SET title = #{blogPost.title}, summary = #{blogPost.summary}, content = #{blogPost.content}, tags = #{blogPost.tags} WHERE blog_id = #{blogId}

UPDATE blog_posts SET del_flag = '1' WHERE blog_id IN
#{id}
